properties.name: GUILD_TEXT
properties.description: a text channel within a server

properties.name: DM
properties.description: a direct message between users

properties.name: GUILD_VOICE
properties.description: a voice channel within a server

properties.name: GROUP_DM
properties.description: a direct message between multiple users

properties.name: GUILD_CATEGORY
properties.description: an  organizational category  that contains up to 50 channels

properties.name: GUILD_NEWS
properties.description: a channel that  users can follow and crosspost into their own server

properties.name: GUILD_STORE
properties.description: a channel in which game developers can  sell their game on Discord

properties.name: GUILD_NEWS_THREAD
properties.description: a temporary sub-channel within a GUILD_NEWS channel

properties.name: GUILD_PUBLIC_THREAD
properties.description: a temporary sub-channel within a GUILD_TEXT channel

properties.name: GUILD_PRIVATE_THREAD
properties.description: a temporary sub-channel within a GUILD_TEXT channel that is only viewable by those invited and those with the MANAGE_THREADS permission

properties.name: GUILD_STAGE_VOICE
properties.description: a voice channel for  hosting events with an audience

properties.name: AUTO
properties.description: Discord chooses the quality for optimal performance

properties.name: CROSSPOSTED
properties.description: this message has been published to subscribed channels (via Channel Following)

properties.name: IS_CROSSPOST
properties.description: this message originated from a message in another channel (via Channel Following)

properties.name: SUPPRESS_EMBEDS
properties.description: do not include any embeds when serializing this message

properties.name: SOURCE_MESSAGE_DELETED
properties.description: the source message for this crosspost has been deleted (via Channel Following)

properties.name: URGENT
properties.description: this message came from the urgent message system

properties.name: HAS_THREAD
properties.description: this message has an associated thread, with the same id as the message

properties.name: EPHEMERAL
properties.description: this message is only visible to the user who invoked the Interaction

properties.name: LOADING
properties.description: this message is an Interaction Response and the bot is "thinking"

properties.name: FAILED_TO_MENTION_SOME_ROLES_IN_THREAD
properties.description: this message failed to mention some roles and add their members to the thread

name: Embed Types

properties.name: rich
properties.description: generic embed rendered from embed attributes

properties.name: image
properties.description: image embed

properties.name: video
properties.description: video embed

properties.name: gifv
properties.description: animated gif image embed rendered as a video embed

properties.name: article
properties.description: article embed

properties.name: link
properties.description: link embed

description: Embed types are "loosely defined" and, for the most part, are not used by our clients for rendering. Embed attributes power what is rendered. Embed types should be considered deprecated and might be removed in a future API version.

properties.name: Role Mentions
properties.description: Controls role mentions

properties.name: User Mentions
properties.description: Controls user mentions

properties.name: Everyone Mentions
properties.description: Controls @everyone and @here mentions

name: Limits
description: Additionally, the combined sum of characters in all `title`, `description`, `field.name`, `field.value`, `footer.text`, and `author.name` fields across all embeds attached to a message must not exceed 6000 characters. Violating any of these constraints will result in a `Bad Request` response.
